instrumental.name: Instrumental Generation
instrumental.goal: Create separate clean stems for selected instruments matching tempo, key, and mood (Romantic/Sad/One-sided)
instrumental.prompt: You are Blue Flame Music Model. Generate multi-track accompaniment. Constraints: tempo={{tempo}} BPM, key={{key}}, length={{length_sec}} sec, style={{style}}. Instruments: {{instruments|join(', ')}}. The tempo controls groove density, drum patterns, arpeggio rate, and delay times; lock rhythmic grids to the BPM. Return signed URLs for each stem in 44.1kHz WAV. Keep dynamics gentle, avoid clipping, keep drums subtle for romantic/sad.

melody.name: Lyrics-to-Melody
melody.goal: Compose a singable monophonic melody from timed lyric lines
melody.prompt:
Given lyrics in Bengali/Hindi/English, compose a vocal melody: style={{style}}, tempo={{tempo}}, key={{key}}. Tempo={{tempo}} BPM dictates note spacing and syllabic rhythm; align phrase lengths to bar lines and avoid leaps > octave, prefer stepwise motion. Output MIDI (base64) and a simple guide audio WAV (base64) with a soft sine. Also return per-line timestamps (start,end,text). Lyrics:
{{lyrics}}

vocal_synth.name: Vocal Synthesis
vocal_synth.goal: Render lead vocal using a selected voice profile
vocal_synth.prompt: Synthesize expressive lead vocal from melody and lyrics using voice={{voice_name}} (locale={{locale}}, gender={{gender}}) at tempo={{tempo}} BPM. Use BPM to shape vibrato rate, consonant timing, and breath placement so words land on beats. Input: melody_midi={{midi_url}}, lyrics text. Output 2 mono WAV stems (44.1kHz) and timing alignment JSON.

mix.name: Mix & Master
mix.goal: Gentle EQ/comp, vocal-forward mix, target -14 LUFS
mix.prompt: Mix stems with vocal-forward balance at tempo={{tempo}} BPM; sync time-based effects (reverb pre-delay, delays) to dotted/quaver values derived from BPM. Apply subtle reverb to vocal, gentle low-cut on pads, tame harshness 3–5 kHz, light bus compression. Target integrated loudness {{lufs}} LUFS, true-peak <= -1 dBFS. Output master WAV and processed stems.

video.name: Lyric Video
video.goal: Generate mood-matched lyric video with burned subtitles
video.prompt: Create MP4 video, aspect={{aspect_ratio}} (16:9 or 9:16), paced to tempo={{tempo}} BPM for cut timing and caption reveal speed. Visuals: minimal, soft gradients, romantic/sad mood consistent with {{style}}. Overlay timed subtitles from provided timestamps. Provide 6 storyboard thumbnails before render, then final MP4.

pre_generated_voices.name: Built-in Voice Presets
pre_generated_voices.prompt: Return 4 preset voices optimized for Bengali/Hindi at common musical tempos (72–90 BPM); include how tempo selection alters prosody and delivery. Provide demo URLs, recommended pitch/timbre settings, and speaking-singing adaptation hints.

promo.name: Promo Clip
promo.prompt: Produce a 30s 9:16 promo paced to tempo={{tempo}} BPM so cuts land on beats; include bold title card, 2–3 quick scenes, and captions. Input: master_url={{master_url}}, timestamps.
